articles.content:
FP TrendingMay 25, 2020 14:35:11 IST
The Infinix Hot 9 series smartphone will make its debutin India on 29 May. The revelation was made by e-commerce website Flipkart. The Infinix Hot 9 series is ex… [+1366 chars]

articles.title: Huami Amazfit Bip S Price Revealed Ahead of June 3 India Launch - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Amazfit Bip S is priced at Rs. 4,999 and will go on sale through Amazon, Flipkart, and Myntra. The smartwatch was originally unveiled at CES 2020 in January.
articles.content: Huami Amazfit Bip S smartwatch will be launched in India on June 3 as per the recent announcement by the Xiaomi backed company. At the time, the pricing for the smartwatch was not disclosed but now, … [+2202 chars]
